lexUnit.name: purse.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a small pouch of leather or plastic used for carrying money or a handbag.

sentence.text: She put the key in her pocket and left her purse in the car .
Hastily she searched for her purse in her bag , recalling part of their earlier conversation when he had been escorting her around the park .
